buildCommand: cd client && npm install && npm run build
_comment: REQUIRED ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES - Set these in Vercel Dashboard > Settings > Environment Variables:

_env_vars.VITE_API_URL: Backend API URL (e.g., https://your-backend.railway.app/api) - Must include /api
_env_vars.VITE_SOCKET_URL: Socket.io Server URL (e.g., https://your-backend.railway.app) - Do NOT include /api

_instructions: 1. Go to Vercel Dashboard > Your Project > Settings > Environment Variables, 2. Add VITE_API_URL and VITE_SOCKET_URL, 3. Set for Production, Preview, and Development, 4. Redeploy after adding variables
